id.description: Unique identifier for the order risk entry.

order_id.description: The identifier of the order to which the risk is related.

checkout_id.description: The unique identifier of the checkout associated with the order.

score.description: Numerical score indicating the level of risk.

recommendation.description: Suggested action to mitigate the risk.

display.description: Flag to determine if the risk should be displayed to the merchant.

cause_cancel.description: Reason indicating why the order is at risk of cancellation.

message.description: Description of the risk associated with the order.

merchant_message.description: Message shown to the merchant regarding the risk.

shop_url.description: URL of the shop where the order was placed.
